title: Rustic bacon, apples and cabbage
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon olive oil', '6 rashers streaky bacon, chopped', '1 large onion, chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon caster sugar or to taste', '2 tablespoons cider vinegar', '1 head green cabbage, cored and chopped', '2 large Granny Smith apples, peeled, cored and thickly sliced', '125ml chicken stock or as needed', '1/2 teaspoon coriander seeds', '1 pinch nutmeg', '125ml soured cream']
